relevant_findings.description: Moderate distress, dry mucous membranes, scattered inspiratory wheezes, pallor, decreased skin turgor, puncture wounds on arms and hands.

Ill, anxious, diaphoretic; soft non-distended abdomen with mild tenderness; diffuse purple blanching livedo on arms and legs; mottling on flanks and abdomen; slightly blue fingers and ears; numerous lacerations with necrotic edges; capillary refill in 5 seconds.

Dermatologic examination revealed diffuse, symmetric, coalescing retiform patches of purple ecchymoses and purpura spanning the abdomen, chest, arms, legs, and face; some discrete bite and scratch marks; persistent bluish hue in earlobes and fingers.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The rash worsened, becoming coalescing and non-blanching.

relevant_findings.description: Rigidity and cyanosis of the right arm developed.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of skin findings towards necrosis and gangrene.
